ValidationRule.description: CR : GTMS-11088 Added Remorse Refund Check
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Account.Netsuite_Delinquent_Status__c,'Written-off'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type ,'Remorse Refund')), NOT(OR($Profile.Name='Sales Ops Profile',$Profile.Name='Samsara - Finance Admin',$Profile.Name='Samsara - Finance', $Permission.NetSuite_Service_User_Permission, $Profile.Name='System Administrator')), Account.Delinquent_Override__c==FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Account is blocked due to delinquency. Please reach out to Finance for additional information!
